data.question: What is the maximum absorption wavelength of H4TPBD in DMF solution?
What is the crystal system and space group of [Zn2(TPBD)(DMAc)2]?
What method was used for the excitonic coupling analysis in the study?
What is the enhancement factor (ξ) for the TPA cross-sections of [Cd2(TPBD)(H2O)4] compared to [Zn2(TPBD)(DMAc)2]?
What is the role of high frequency phenyl-ring stretching modes in the photoluminescence spectrum of H4TPBD?
data.answer: They contribute to the vibronic coupling in the coordination polymer compounds.

data.question: What is the thermal stability range of [Zn2(TPBD)(DMAc)2]?
What is the main feature observed in the Raman spectra of [Zn2(TPBD)(DMAc)2] and [Cd2(TPBD)(H2O)4]?
What is the significance of the calculated excitonic splitting energies in the study?
data.answer: They help in understanding the redshift in the absorbance, reflectance, and PLE spectra compared to H4TPBD.

data.question: What is the external quantum yield (EQY) of [Cd2(TPBD)(H2O)4]?
What computational method was used for the quantum chemical calculations in the study?
data.answer: Density Functional Theory (DFT) and Time-Dependent Density Functional Theory (TD-DFT)

data.question: What is the role of the Squeeze routine of Platon in the study?
data.answer: It was used to treat disordered solvent molecules as diffuse contributions without specific positions.

data.question: What is the significance of the two-photon absorption properties analyzed in the study?
data.answer: They provide insights into the structure-related enhancement of two-photon absorption of the coordination polymers.

data.question: What is the crystal system and space group of [Cd2(TPBD)(H2O)4]?
What is the significance of the excitonic coupling strength calculated in the study?
data.answer: It helps in understanding the photophysical response of the coordination polymers.

data.question: What is the role of the cam-B3LYP functional in the computational analysis?
data.answer: It was used for all quantum chemical calculations due to its compliance with the measured spectra.

data.question: What is the significance of the vibronic analysis conducted in the study?
data.answer: It supports the coupling to high frequency vibronic modes in the coordination polymer compounds.

data.question: What is the significance of the solid-state two-photon excited fluorescence method used in the study?
data.answer: It enables the comparison of the two-photon absorption cross-section ratios of the coordination polymers.

data.question: What is the significance of the atomic centered transition density matrix analysis?
data.answer: It provides insights into the delocalized states and charge-transfer participation in the coordination polymers.

data.question: Is the photophysical response of the coordination polymers limited to classical dipole-dipole interactions?
Does the study provide absolute two-photon absorption cross-section values for the coordination polymers?
